verses.verse: A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. Unto thee will I cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> my rock <S%H6697><s%>; be not silent <S%H2814><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to me: lest, if thou be silent <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to me, I become <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8738><s%> like them that go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>, when I cry <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto thee, when I lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> toward thy holy <S%H6944><s%> oracle <S%H1687><s%>.

Draw me not away <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and with the workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>, which speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to their neighbours <S%H7453><s%>, but mischief <S%H7451><s%> is in their hearts <S%H3824><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them according to their deeds <S%H6467><s%>, and according to the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their endeavours <S%H4611><s%>: give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them after the work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>; render <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to them their desert <S%H1576><s%>.

Because they regard <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the works <S%H6468><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, nor the operation <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>, he shall destroy <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and not build them up <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because he hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my shield <S%H4043><s%>; my heart <S%H3820><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in him, and I am helped <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> greatly rejoiceth <S%H5937><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and with my song <S%H7892><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> is their strength <S%H5797><s%>, and he is the saving <S%H3444><s%> strength <S%H4581><s%> of his anointed <S%H4899><s%>.

Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them also, and lift them up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8761><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
